nodes.text: Lectures on the Nature of the Force

Lectures on the Nature of the Force was a compilation of lectures made by Jedi Master Ood Bnar on the nature of the Force. It was published by the Jedi Temple on Coruscant and released to the public. San Herrera and Nia Reston of the Cularin system quoted from the Lectures in their own paper entitled "Life's Memories."
